answers.answer: Hi!The symptoms could be due to a viral bug, or it could be due to severe acidity, or a gut disorder like IBS, Crohn's celiac disease etc. Anxiety and stress can also cause similar symptoms. It can also be due to hormonal imbalance (thyroid, PCOD) or due to diabetes. Do discuss this with your doctor and get yourself examined. Take care!
